entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h then light near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
